7BFE534B.simple_instruction: Click on the {icon:Character_Transmog_Item_Icon, 2.5} button to turn slot transmogs on and off.

86F1FA4E.simple_instruction_controller: Turn slot transmogs on and off by selecting an item with a  {icon:Character_Transmog_Item_Icon, 2.5} icon and pressing {icon:button1, 2}
